body_content.explanation: a piece of toast with cheese sauce on it that is heated until the sauce melts:
examples: I have already given you a recipe for cheese on toast, but Welsh rarebit is quite different.
The cheese is mixed with beer and toasted on bread to form a delicious Welsh Rarebit.
The cheese was grated and melted with milk or ale to make Welsh rabbit.
The success of a rarebit depends to a great extent upon the quality of the cheese.
Top the rarebits with some chopped fresh herbs.
